summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue and 12th Avenue Northeast; each from Sylvester Place to East 65th Street; 10th Avenue Northeast from Ravenna Boulevard to East 65th Street; Sylvester Place, from 10th Avenue Northeast to Brooklyn Avenue; East 62nd Street, East 63rd Street, and East 64th Street, each from a point 120 feet west of 12th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; East 65th Street, from Weedin Place to 15th Avenue Northeast; East 62nd Street from Brooklyn Avenue to a point 400 feet east of 17th Avenue Northeast; East 63rd Street from Brooklyn Avenue to 18th Avenue Northeast; 14th Avenue Northeast from East 63rd Street to a point 300 feet north of East 70th Street; 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 63rd Street to East 75th Street; 17th Avenue Northeast, from East 63rd Street to a point 300 feet north of East 70th Street; 18th Avenue Northeast, from East 63rd Street t o a point 180 feet north of East 73rd Street; and 9th Avenue Northeast, from Ravenna Boulavrd to East 65th Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3429, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
